head.title: Treasury and Debt Offerings Set for This Week

hedline.hl1: Treasury and Debt Offerings Set for This Week

block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to the today's regular weekly auction of three- and six-month bills.
By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.96 percent and a six-month bill was 6.00 percent.
The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to the today's regular weekly auction of three- and six-month bills.
By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.96 percent and a six-month bill was 6.00 percent.
The following taxable and tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
TAXABLE ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Ahold Finance U.S.A. Inc., (guaranteed by Royal Ahold), $500 million of senior notes. J.P. Morgan and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, joint-leads.
Alcoa Inc., $1.5 billion of debt securities in 2 parts, 5-year and 10-year maturities. A1/A+. J.P. Morgan and Solomon Smith Barney, joint-leads.
BVBC Capital Trust I (Blue Valley Bancorp), $1.25 million shares of $8 trust preferred securities due in 2030. Stifel.
(Source: MCM CorporateWatch) Ratings: Moody's Investors Service/Standard & Poor's Corp./Duff & Phelps Credit.
TAX EXEMPT
TUESDAY
Demo for Maryland, $200 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
Florida Lottery, $150 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
Trustees of Purdue University, $50 million of debt securities. Negotiable.
TAX EXEMPT
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Allegheny County Hospital, $429 million of debt securites. Salomon, Smith Barney.
City of Aurora, $76.1 million certificates of participation. Dain Rauscher Inc.
Dutchess County Industrial, $85 million of Bard College Civic Facility Revenue Bonds. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Harris County, Texas, $103.9 million of Hospital District Revenue Bonds. Dain Rauscher Inc.
Houston Water and Sewer, $270 million of debt securities. Merril Lynch & Co.
Los Angeles Unified School District, $350 million of debt securities. Salomon Smith Barney.
Main Health & Education, $52 million of debt securities. Merril Lynch & Co.
Ohio Housing Finance Authority, $300 million of single family mortgage revenue bonds. Goldman, Sachs.
